SELECT_A_LANGUAGE: Select the language you want to set for Filo.
LANGUAGE_SELECTED: You have successfully selected **{{language}}** as Filo's language.
PROTECTED_COMMAND_OR_CATEGORY: The **{{value}}** {{target}} is protected by the Filo's Administration and can't be disabled.
SELECT_A_COMMAND_TO_ENABLE_OR_DISABLE: You must specify a command below to {{status}} it.
MODULE_ENABLED: The **{{module}}** module has been successfully enabled.
MODULE_DISABLED: The **{{module}}** module has been successfully disabled.
MODULE_NEEDS_TO_BE_ENABLED: The **{{module}}** module needs to be enabled before.
MODULE_NEEDS_TO_BE_ENABLED_PROTIP: Enable this module by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
REPORTS_ENABLED_PROTIP: Set the channel for sending reports by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
CHANNEL_SET: You have set the **[#{{channel.name}}]({{url}})** channel for the **{{module}}** module.
WELCOMES_ENABLED_PROTIP: Set the welcome channel by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
WELCOME_ROLE_ENABLED_PROTIP: Set the welcome role by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
FAREWELLS_ENABLED_PROTIP: Set the farewell channel by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
CHANNEL_NOT_CONFIGURED: The **{{module}}** module needs you to configure a channel before continuing.
CHANNEL_NOT_CONFIGURED_TIP: Configure the channel by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
MODULE_RESET_SUCCESSFULLY: The **{{module}}** module data has been reset successfully.
WAITING_MESSAGE: Waiting for you to send a message to set it in the **{{module}}** module.
MESSAGE_SET: You have successfully set the **{{module}}** module message.
MESSAGE_TYPE_SET: You have set the message type for the **{{module}}** module.
ROLE_SET: You have set the {{role.mention}} ({{role.id}}) role for the **{{module}}** module.
MEMBER_COUNTER_ENABLED_PROTIP: Set the channel member counter by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
MEMBER_COUNTER_NAME_MISSING_VARIABLE: The name of the member counter channel must contain this variable: **{{variable}}**.
MEMBER_COUNTER_NAME_SET: You have set the name of the member counter channel successfully.
MEMBER_COUNTER_NICKNAME_ENABLED_PROTIP: Set the nickname of the member counter nickname by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
MEMBER_COUNTER_NICKNAME_MISSING_VARIABLE: The nickname of the member counter nickname must contain this variable: **{{variable}}**.
MEMBER_COUNTER_NICKNAME_SET: You have set the nickname of the member counter nickname successfully.
LOGGING_ENABLED_PROTIP: Enable or disable events by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
SELECT_A_LOGGING_EVENT_CATEGORY: Select the category of logging events you want to {{status}}.
SELECT_A_LOGGING_EVENT_CATEGORY_SET_CHAN: Select the event category you want to assign to this channel.
SELECT_A_LOGGING_EVENT: Select the event you want to manage.
LOGGING_ALL_EVENTS_SET_CHANNEL: You have set the **[#{{channel.name}}]({{url}})** channel for all events.
LOGGING_ALL_SPECIFIC_EVENTS_SET_CHANNEL: You have set the **[#{{channel.name}}]({{url}})** channel for all **{{target}}** events.
LOGGING_EVENT_SET_CHANNEL: You have set the **[#{{channel.name}}]({{url}})** channel for the **{{event}}** event.
SET_ACTION_PROTIP: Set the action by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
ACTION_SET: You have set the **{{action}}** action for the **{{module}}** module.
DISCORD_INVITES_IGNORE_ENABLE: Invites from official Discord servers will now be ignored.
DISCORD_INVITES_IGNORE_DISABLE: Invites from official Discord servers will now not be ignored.
FILO_INVITES_IGNORE_ENABLE: Invites from the official Filo server will now be ignored.
FILO_INVITES_IGNORE_DISABLE: Invites from the official Filo server will now not be ignored.
CHANNEL_IGNORE_ADDED_OR_REMOVED: You have {{status}} the **[#{{channel.name}}]({{url}})** channel to the list of ignored channels of the **{{module}}** module.
ROLE_IGNORE_ADDED_OR_REMOVED: You have {{status}} the **{{role.mention}}** role to the list of ignored roles of the **{{module}}** module.
GUILD_IGNORE_ADDED_OR_REMOVED: You have {{status}} the guild with ID **{{guild.id}}** to the list of ignored guilds of the **{{module}}** module.
IGNORE_DISCORD_OFFICIAL_GUILDS: Ignore invites from official Discord's servers
IGNORE_FILO_OFFICIAL_GUILD: Ignore invites from the official Filo's server
AUTO_MODERATION_ENABLED_PROTIP: Add a level by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
EXISTING_LEVEL: There is already a level with the same number of warnings.
MISSING_TIME: The action you specified is temporary and requires the time to be specified.
LEVEL_DATA_SET: You have modified the data of the level **{{level}}**.
ACTION_DOES_NOT_APPLY: The current action of the **{{module}}** module doesn't support this configuration.
DUPLICATES_DATA_SET: You have set that only **{{threshold}}** messages can be sent every **{{time}}**.
BAD_WORD_ADDED_OR_REMOVED: You have {{status}} the word **{{word}}** as a bad word.
AGGRESSIVE_FILTER_ENABLED_OR_DISABLED: You have **{{status}}** the aggressive bad word detection filter.
DISCORD_LINKS_IGNORE_DISABLE: Links from Discord-managed domains will not be ignored now.
DISCORD_LINKS_IGNORE_ENABLE: Links from Discord-managed domains will now be ignored.
FILO_LINKS_IGNORE_DISABLE: Links from Filo-managed domains will not be ignored now.
FILO_LINKS_IGNORE_ENABLE: Links from Filo-managed domains will now be ignored.
ENABLE_FILO_LINKS_BYPASS: Enable the bypass to Filo links by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
ENABLE_DISCORD_LINKS_BYPASS: Enable the bypass to Discord links by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
DISABLE_FILO_LINKS_BYPASS: Disable the bypass to Filo links by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
DISABLE_DISCORD_LINKS_BYPASS: Disable the bypass to Discord links by executing this command: **{{command}}**.
LINK_BYPASS_ADDED_OR_REMOVED: You have {{status}} the **{{link}}** link to the list of ignored links.
MUTED_ROLE_SET: You have successfully set the **Muted** role.
ROLE_REMOVED: You have removed all the parameters from the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role.
BITFIELD_SET: You have set the **[permissions]({{url}})** for the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role.
DM_NOTIFICATIONS_ENABLED_OR_DISABLED: You have successfully **{{status}}** the direct messages notifications.
